refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Rltool 1.7 has been developed by Ishan Pendharkar at the Indian Institute of Technology Bombay, India (2002-2006), and at the Max Planck Institute, Germany (2007- ), with inputs from: Jose Paulo Vilela Soares da Cunha, State University of Rio de Janeiro - UERJ - Brazil. The following people provided valuable help and comments: Prof. John Bechoefer, Peter Auer. If you are using Rltool, feel free to mail bouquets and brickbats to ishan[AT]iitbombay.org. Latest information about Rltool can be obtained at: http://www.ee.iitb.ac.in/uma/~ishan/scilab/rltool.htm
If you use Rltool, the author shall be delighted to hear from you. Please e-mail ishan@iitbombay.org])Closes the file.
